explains: conj. 凭此，借以，与……一致；<非正式>在……的情况下，处于……的位置

sentences.en: They have introduced a new system whereby all employees must undergo regular training.
sentences.cn: 他们采用了新的制度，所有的雇员都必须定期进行培训。

sentences.en: The two colleges have a reciprocal arrangement whereby students from one college can attend classes at the other.
sentences.cn: 两所学院有一项互惠协定，允许学生在院际间选课。

sentences.en: The company operates an arrangement whereby employees may select any 8-hour period between 6 a.m. to 8 p.m. to go to work.
sentences.cn: 该公司做出了一种安排，据此员工可以在上午6点到晚上8点之间任意选择8个小时去上班。
